Color Palette

Below are all of the pre-packaged and configuarable colors that come with Frontend. To change or add additional colors, edit/add variables in the src/scss/application/global/_variables.scss (for more information, see _variables.scss).

Headline 1

Jack Tar holystone grog blossom spike blow the man down capstan hardtack reef heave to quarterdeck. Port grog blossom pink topsail Jack Tar mizzenmast gangplank aft long clothes gunwalls. Carouser port long clothes swab dance the hempen jig broadside pirate swing the lead Nelsons folly black jack.

  • Unordered list element 1
  • Unordered list element 2
  • Unordered list element 3

Headline 3

Jack Tar holystone grog blossom spike blow the man down capstan hardtack reef heave to quarterdeck. Port grog blossom pink topsail Jack Tar mizzenmast gangplank aft long clothes gunwalls. Carouser port long clothes swab dance the hempen jig broadside pirate swing the lead Nelsons folly black jack.

"Yawl gaff lad keel yardarm topgallant Shiver me timbers heave down Pieces of Eight Buccaneer. Heave down gabion bilge water code of conduct swing the lead sheet Letter of Marque nipper ahoy plunder. Mizzenmast chantey belay ye prow hearties fire in the hole grapple gaff gangplank."

Yar Pirate Ipsum
